'''Shadow of the Knight's Blade''' is a part of the [[Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses]] event in [[Version 5.1]].

It is unlocked after completing the {{Quest|Shadow of the Knight's Blade}} and is accessed by talking to [[Safi]] and [[Vihar]] at the {{Icon|Dialogue Shadow of the Knight's Blade}} icon.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses Shadow of the Knight's Blade 1.png
|text1    = During "Shadow of the Knight's Blade," defeat as many enemies as possible {{Color|help|within the time limit}} to obtain the highest possible score.<br>You may claim the rewards corresponding to the highest score obtained in the stage.
|image2   = Tutorial Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses Shadow of the Knight's Blade 2.png
|text2    = Defeat opponents or use specific {{Color|help|Showstopper Moves}} to accumulate {{Color|help|Scenic Performance}}. Once you gain a certain amount of {{Color|help|Scenic Performance}}, you can increase your {{Color|help|Performance Level}}, granting you more powerful buffs.
}}

===Swordsmanship, Simple and Solid===
{{Description|Legends say the Knight of Flowers drilled the basics every day, familiarizing himself with the properties of every element. If one hones simple techniques to perfection, any enemy can be dealt with, no matter how tricky...}}
Unlocks 2024-10-23 04{{Colon}}00

;Theme Info

* Performance Assistance: When your Performance Level is 1/2/3 respectively, all party members' Max HP increases by {{Color|help|20%/50%/100%}} and Elemental Mastery by {{Color|help|60/150/300}}.<br>Additionally, if your Performance Level is 3, when your character triggers {{Color|help|Vaporize}} against an opponent, unleash a {{Color|help|Knightwave}} at the character's position that deals True DMG to nearby opponents. 1 {{Color|help|Knightwave}} can be produced in this way every 4s.

{{Description|The combination of greenery and the light of flames often strongly reminds people of incredibly strong vitality.
